title: The ideas of the First World War
itunes:title: The ideas of the First World War
itunes:subtitle: Professor Hew Strachan considers the ideologies that propelled combatants in the 1914–18 war, in a lecture delivered at BBC History Magazine's First World War day event. Rob Attar presents
description:
Professor Hew Strachan considers the ideologies that propelled combatants in the 1914–18 war, in a lecture delivered at BBC History Magazine's First World War day event. Rob Attar presents

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
